# 47.1.5 Concentration of Advances

The Bank's top 10 exposures on the basis of total (funded and non-funded exposures) aggregated to Rs. 846,033 million (2023: Rs. 478,848 million) are as follows:

| |2024|2023| | | | |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|Funded|650,326,358|166,962,464| | | | |
|Non Funded|195,706,719|311,886,407| | | | |
|Total Exposure|846,033,077|478,848,871| | | | |

The sanctioned limits against these top 10 exposures aggregated to Rs. 1,037,771 million (2023: Rs. 531,971 million).

None of the exposure against these top 10 exposures is classified.

For the purpose of this note, exposure means outstanding funded facilities and utilised non-funded facilities as at the reporting date.

---
